sentences.sContent: Pre-conditioning broil ers to heat stress to encourage better survival during transport, for example, could lead to more variable breast meat taste, appearance and texture.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pre-conditioning broil ers to heat stress to encourage better survival during transport, for example, could lead to more variable breast meat taste, appearance and texture.
sentences.sCn: 举个例子， 为了更好地提高火鸡在运输途中的存活率所使用的热力温控烤箱 ，可能会让胸脯肉产生更多中变化的味道、外观以及口感。

words.tran: 烤焙用具；酷热的日子；烤肉

trans.tranOther: When you broil food, you cook it using very strong heat directly above it
